dcmDigestAlgorithm.title: Digest Algorithm
dcmDigestAlgorithm.description: Algorithm for generation of check sums: 'MD5' or 'SHA-1'

dcmInstanceAvailability.title: Instance Availability
dcmInstanceAvailability.description: Instance Availability: ONLINE, NEARLINE or OFFLINE

dcmReadOnly.title: Read Only
dcmReadOnly.description: Indicates if a Storage System is read only

dcmStorageThreshold.title: Storage Threshold
dcmStorageThreshold.description: Minimal Usable Space on Storage System. If the usable space fall below that value the Storage System will be removed from the list of configured Storage Systems of the Network AE requesting that Storage System. Format nnn(MB|GB|MiB|GiB)

dcmDeleterThreshold.title: Deleter Threshold
dcmDeleterThreshold.description: Minimal Usable Space on Storage System to trigger deletion. If present, studies are deleted from the Storage System, if the usable space fall below that value. Format [nn'['<schedule>']']nnn(MB|GB|MiB|GiB)

dcmExternalRetrieveAET.title: External Retrieve AET
dcmExternalRetrieveAET.description: Constrain deletion of Studies, whose objects are retrievable using this AE from an external C-MOVE SCP, if usable space falls below configured threshold.

dicomNetworkAE.title: Network AEs
dicomNetworkAE.description: Network AEs associated with the Storage System

dcmObjectStorageID.title: Content
dcmObjectStorageID.description: Indicates if the Storage System is used for Object Storage

dcmMetadataStorageID.title: Content
dcmMetadataStorageID.description: Indicates if the Storage System is used for Metadata Storage

dcmSeriesMetadataStorageID.title: Series Metadata
dcmSeriesMetadataStorageID.description: Indicates if the Storage System is used for Series Metadata Storage

usableSpace.title: Usable Space
usableSpace.description: Usable Space left on Storage System. Format nnn(MB|GB).

totalSpace.title: Total Space
totalSpace.description: Total Space on Storage System. Format nnn(MB|GB).
